question: Section 202 07 (b)
sols_html:
We want

\[\begin{aligned} (0,1) &\Rightarrow p_1(0)=1\\ (1,0) &\Rightarrow p_1(1)=0\\ (1,0) &\Rightarrow p_2(1)=0\\ (2,2) &\Rightarrow p_2(2)=2\end{aligned}\]

These translate to:

\[\begin{aligned} 1 &= 0+0+0+d_1\\ 0 &= a_1+b_1+c_1+d_1\\ 0 &= 0+0+0+d_2\\ 2 &= a_2+b_2+c_2+d_2\end{aligned}\]

statement_html:
We want to interpolate through (0, 1), (1, 0), (2, 2) using cubic splines

\[\begin{aligned} f(x) = \begin{cases} p_1(x), & 0 \leq x \leq 1 \\ p_2(x), & 1 \leq x \leq 2 \end{cases}\end{aligned}\]

(b) \(f\)(x) must pass through all given points. Write down the linear equations expressing this condition.
